FactionAbilities.Name: Mitosis
FactionAbilities.Ability: Your space docks cannot produce infantry. At the start of the status phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

FactionTechnology.Name: Bioplasmosis
FactionTechnology.Ability: At the end of the status phase , you may remove any number of infantry from planets you control and place them on 1 or more planets you control in the same or adjacent systems.

FactionUnits.Name: Letani Warrior II
Abilities: After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die.  If the result is 6 or greater, place the unit on this card.  At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Stymie
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Arborec player cannot produce units in or adjacent to non-home systems that contain 1 or more of your units. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Arborec player's units, return this card to the Arborec player.

Flagship.Name: Duha Menaimon
Abilities: After you activate this system, you may produce up to 5 units in this system.

Mech.Name: Letani Behemoth
Mech.Description: DEPLOY: When you would use your MITOSIS faction ability you may replace 1 of your infantry with 1 mech from your reinforcements instead.

Leaders.Name: Letani Ospha
Leaders.Ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card and choose a player's non-fighter ship; that player may replace that ship with one from their reinforcements that costs up to 2 more than the replaced ship.

Leaders.Name: Drzuga Rophal
Leaders.Unlock: Have 12 Ground Forces on Planets you control.
Leaders.Ability: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your units that have PRODUCTION: You may produce 1 unit in that system.

Leaders.Name: Letani Miasmiala
Leaders.Ability:
ULTRASONIC EMITTER
ACTION: Produce any number of units in any number of systems that contain 1 or more of your ground forces. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Zeal
FactionAbilities.Ability: You always vote first during the agenda phase. When you cast at least 1 vote, cast 1 additional vote for each player in the game including you.

FactionAbilities.Name: Raid Formation
FactionAbilities.Ability: When 1 or more of your units uses ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, for each hit produced in excess of your opponent's Fighters, choose 1 of your opponent's ships that has SUSTAIN DAMAGE to become damaged.

FactionTechnology.Name: Aerie Hololattice
FactionTechnology.Description: Other players cannot move ships through systems that contain your structures. Each planet that contains 1 or more of your structures gains the PRODUCTION 1 ability as if it were a unit.

FactionUnits.Name: Strike Wing Alpha II
Abilities: When this unit uses ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, each result of 9 or 10 also destroys 1 of your opponent's infantry in the space area of the active system.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Strike Wing Ambuscade
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: When 1 or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability: Choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die. Then, return this card to the Argent player

Flagship.Name: Quetzecoatl
Abilities: Other players cannot use space cannon against your ships in this system.

Mech.Name: Aerie Sentinel
Mech.Description: This unit does not count against capacity if it is being transported or if it is in a space area with 1 or more of your ships that have capacity values.

Leaders.Name: Trillossa Aun Mirik
Leaders.Ability: When a player produces ground forces in a system: You may exhaust this card; that player may place those units on any planets they control in that system and any adjacent systems.

Leaders.Name: Trrakan Aun Zulok
Leaders.Unlock: Have 6 units that have ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE, SPACE CANNON or BOMBARDMENT on the game board
Leaders.Ability: When 1 or more of your units make a roll for a unit ability: You may choose 1 of those units to roll 1 additional die.

Leaders.Name: Mirik Aun Sissiri
Leaders.Ability:
HELIX PROTOCOL
ACTION: Move any number of your ships from any systems to any number of other systems that contain 1 of your command tokens and no other players' ships. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Munitions Reserves
FactionAbilities.Ability: At the start of each round of space combat, you may spend 2 trade goods;  you may re-roll any number of your dice during that combat round.

FactionAbilities.Name: Armada
FactionAbilities.Ability: The maximum number of non-fighter ships you can have in each system is equal to 2 more than the number of tokens in your fleet pool.

FactionTechnology.Name: L4 Disruptors
FactionTechnology.Description: During an invasion, units cannot use SPACE CANNON against your units.

FactionTechnology.Name: Non-Euclidean Shielding
FactionTechnology.Description: When 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, cancel 2 hits instead of 1.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: War Funding
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: At the start of a round of space combat: The Letnev player loses 2 trade goods. During this combat round, re-roll any number of your dice. Then, return this card to the Letnev player.

Flagship.Name: Arc Secundus
Abilities: Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD.  At the start of each space combat round, repair this ship.

Mech.Name: Dunlain Reaper
Mech.Description: DEPLOY: At the start of a round of ground combat, you may spend 2 resources to replace 1 of your infantry in that combat with 1 mech.

Leaders.Name: Viscount Unlenn
Leaders.Ability: At the start of a Space Combat round: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 ship in the active system. That ship rolls 1 additional die during this combat round.

Leaders.Name: Rear Admiral Farran
Leaders.Ability: After 1 of your units uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE you may gain 1 Trade Good

Leaders.Name: Darktalon Treilla
Leaders.Ability:
DARK MATTER AFFINITY
ACTION: Place this card near the game board; the number of non-fighter ships you can have in systems is not limited by laws or by the number of command tokens in your fleet pool during this game round. At the end of that game round, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Scavenge
FactionAbilities.Ability: After you gain control of a planet, gain 1 trade good.

FactionAbilities.Name: Nomadic
FactionAbilities.Ability: You can score objectives even if you do not control the planets in your home system.

FactionTechnology.Name: Chaos Mapping
FactionTechnology.Description: Other players cannot activate asteroid fields that contain 1 or more of your ships. At the start of your turn during the action phase, you may produce 1 unit in a system that contains at least 1 of your units that has Production.

FactionUnits.Name: Floating Factory I
Abilities: This unit is placed in a space area instead of on a planet. This unit can move and retreat as if it were a ship. If this unit is blockaded, it is destroyed.

FactionUnits.Name: Floating Factory II
Abilities: This unit is placed in a space area instead of on a planet. This unit can move and retreat as if it were a ship. If this unit is blockaded, it is destroyed.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Ragh's Call
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: After you commit 1 or more units to land on a planet: Remove all of the Saar player's ground forces from that planet and place them on a planet controlled by the Saar player. Then return this card to the Saar player.

Mech.Name: Scavenger Zeta
Mech.Description: DEPLOY: After you gain control of a planet, you may spend 1 trade good to place 1 mech on that planet.

Leaders.Name: Captain Mendosa
Leaders.Ability: After a player activates a system: You may exhaust this card to increase the move value of 1 of that player's ships to match the move value of the ship on the game board that has the highest move value.

Leaders.Name: Rowl Sarrig
Leaders.Unlock: Have 3 space docks on the game board
Leaders.Ability: When you produce fighters or infantry: You may place each of those units at any of your space docks that are not blockaded.

Leaders.Name: Gurno Aggero
Leaders.Ability:
ARMAGEDDON RELAY
ACTION: Choose 1 system that is adjacent to 1 of your space docks. Destroy all other player's infantry and fighters in that system. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Star Forge
FactionAbilities.Ability: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place either 2 fighters or 1 destroyer from your reinforcements in a system that contains 1 or more of your war suns.

FactionAbilities.Name: Gashlai Physiology
FactionAbilities.Ability: Your ships can move through supernovas. Note: Moving through a system is distinct from moving into a system. See Movement rules for details.

FactionTechnology.Name: Magmus Reactor
FactionTechnology.Description: Your ships can move into supernovas. After 1 or more of your units use Production in a system that either contains a war sun or is adjacent to a supernova, gain 1 trade good.

FactionUnits.Name: Prototype War Sun I
Abilities: Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD.

FactionUnits.Name: Prototype War Sun II
Abilities: Other players' units in this system lose PLANETARY SHIELD.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Fires of the Gashlai
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: ACTION: Remove 1 token from the Muaat player's fleet pool and return it to their reinforcements. Then, gain your war sun unit upgrade technology card. Then, return this card to the Muaat player.

Flagship.Name: The Inferno
Abilities: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 1 cruiser in this unit's system.

Mech.Name: Ember Colossus
Mech.Description: When you use your STAR FORGE faction ability in this system or an adjacent system, you may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements with this unit.

Leaders.Name: Umbat
Leaders.Ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card to choose a player; that player may produce up to 2 units that each have a cost of 4 or less in a system that contains one of their war suns or their flagship.

Leaders.Name: Magmus
Leaders.Ability: After you spend a token from your strategy pool: You may gain 1 trade good.

Leaders.Name: Adjudicator Ba'al
Leaders.Ability:
NOVA SEED
After you move a war sun into a non-home system other than Mecatol Rex: You may destroy all other players' units in that system and replace that system tile with the Muaat supernova tile. If you do, purge this card and each planet card that corresponds to the replaced system tile.

FactionAbilities.Name: Masters of Trade
FactionAbilities.Ability: You do not have to spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the "Trade" strategy card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Guild Ships
FactionAbilities.Ability: You can negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbor.

FactionAbilities.Name: Arbiters
FactionAbilities.Ability: When you are negotiating a transaction, action cards can be exchanged as part of that transaction.

FactionTechnology.Name: Production Biomes
FactionTechnology.Description: ACTION: Exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool to gain 4 trade goods and choose 1 other player; that player gains 2 trade goods.

FactionTechnology.Name: Quantum Datahub Node
FactionTechnology.Description: At the end of the strategy phase, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool and give another player 3 of your trade goods.  If you do, give 1 of your strategy cards to that player and take 1 of their strategy cards.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Trade Convoys
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: ACTION: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, you may negotiate transactions with players who are not your neighbor. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Hacan player's units, return this card to the Hacan player.

Flagship.Name: Wrath of Kenara
Abilities: After you roll a die during a space combat in this system, you may spend 1 trade good to apply +1 to the result.

Mech.Name: Pride of Kenara
Mech.Description: This planet's card may be traded as part of a transaction; if you do, move all of your units from this planet to another planet you control.

Leaders.Name: Carth of Golden Sands
Leaders.Ability: During the action phase: You may exhaust this card to gain 2 commodities or replenish another player's commodities.

Leaders.Name: Gila the Silvertongue
Leaders.Ability: When you cast votes: You may spend any number of trade goods; cast 2 additional votes for each trade good spent.

Leaders.Name: Harrugh Gefhara
Leaders.Ability:
GALACTIC SECURITIES NET
When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION: You may reduce the cost of each of your units to 0 during this use of PRODUCTION. If you do, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Voidborn
FactionAbilities.Ability: Nebulae do not affect your ships' movement.

FactionAbilities.Name: Aetherpassage
FactionAbilities.Ability: After a player activates a system, you may allow that player to move their ships through systems that contain your ships.

FactionAbilities.Name: Dark Whispers
FactionAbilities.Ability: During setup, take the additional Empyrean faction promissory note; you have 2 faction promissory notes.

FactionTechnology.Name: Aetherstream
FactionTechnology.Description: After you or one of your neighbors activates a system that is adjacent to an anomaly, you may apply +1 to the move value of all of that player's ships during this tactical action.

FactionTechnology.Name: Voidwatch
FactionTechnology.Description: After a player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your units, they must give you 1 promissory note from their hand, if able.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Dark Pact
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area. When you give a number of commodities to the Empyrean player equal to your maximum commodity value, you each gain 1 trade good. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Empyrean player's units, return this card to the Empyrean player.
FactionPromissoryNote.SecondPNDescription: ACTION: Place this card face up in your play area. When you and the Empyrean player cast votes for the same outcome, cast 4 additional votes for that outcome If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Empyrean player's units, return this card to the Empyrean player.

Flagship.Name: Dynamo
Abilities: After any player's unit in this system or an adjacent system uses SUSTAIN DAMAGE, you may spend 2 influence to repair that unit.

Mech.Name: Watcher
Mech.Description: You may remove this unit from a system that contains or is adjacent to another player's units to cancel an action card played by that player.

Leaders.Name: Acamar
Leaders.Ability: After a player moves ships into a system that does not contain any planets: You may exhaust this card; that player gains 1 command token.

Leaders.Name: Xuange
Leaders.Unlock: Be neighbors with all other players
Leaders.Ability: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 of your command tokens: You may return that token to your reinforcements.

Leaders.Name: Conservator Procyon
Leaders.Ability:
MULTIVERSE SHIFT
ACTION: Place 1 frontier token in each system that does not contain any planets and does not already have a frontier token. Then, explore each frontier token that is in a system that contains 1 or more of your ships. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Orbital Drop
FactionAbilities.Ability: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 2 infantry from your reinforcements on 1 planet you control.

FactionAbilities.Name: Versatile
FactionAbilities.Ability: When you gain command tokens during the status phase, gain 1 additional command token.

FactionUnits.Name: Spec Ops II
Abilities: After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 5 or greater, place the unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Military Support
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: At the start of the Sol player's turn: Remove 1 token from the Sol player's strategy pool, if able, and return it to his reinforcements. Then, you may place 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control. Then return this card to the Sol player.

Flagship.Name: Genesis
Abilities: At the end of the status phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements in this system's space area.

Mech.Name: ZS Thunderbolt M2
Mech.Description: DEPLOY: After you use your ORBITAL DROP faction ability, you may spend 3 resources to place 1 mech on that planet.

Leaders.Name: Evelyn Delouis
Leaders.Ability: At the start of a ground combat round: You may exhaust this card to choose 1 ground force in the active system; that ground force rolls 1 additional die during that combat round.

Leaders.Name: Claire Gibson
Leaders.Unlock: Control planets that have a combined total of at least 12 resources.
Leaders.Ability: At the start of a ground combat on a planet you control: You may place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on that planet.

Leaders.Name: Jace X. 4th Air Legion
Leaders.Ability:
HELIO COMMAND ARRAY
ACTION: Remove each of your command tokens from the game board and return them to your reinforcements. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Quantum Entanglement
FactionAbilities.Ability: You treat all systems that contain either an alpha or beta wormhole as adjacent to each other. Game effects cannot prevent you from using this ability.

FactionAbilities.Name: Slipstream
FactionAbilities.Ability: During your tactical actions, apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships that starts its movement in your home system  or in a system that contains either an alpha or beta wormhole.

FactionAbilities.Name: Creuss Gate
FactionAbilities.Ability: When you create the game board, place the Creuss Gate (tile 17) where your home system would normally be placed. The Creuss Gate system is not a home system. Then, place your home system (tile 51) in your play area.

FactionTechnology.Name: Wormhole Generator
FactionTechnology.Description: At the start of the status phase, place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships.

FactionTechnology.Name: Dimensional Splicer
FactionTechnology.Description: At the start of space combat in a system that contains a wormhole and 1 or more of your ships, you may produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Creuss Iff
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: At the start of your turn during the action phase: Place or move a Creuss wormhole token into either a system that contains a planet you control or a non-home system that does not contain another player's ships. Then, return this card to the Creuss player.

Flagship.Name: Hil Colish
Abilities: This ship's system contains a delta wormhole. During movement, this ship may move before or after your other ships.

Mech.Name: Icarus Drive
Mech.Description: After any player activates a system, you may remove this unit from the game board to place or move a Creuss wormhole token into this system.

Leaders.Name: Emissary Taivra
Leaders.Ability: After a player activates a system that contains a non-delta wormhole: You may exhaust this card; if you do, that system is adjacent to all other systems that contain a wormhole during this tactical action.

Leaders.Name: Sai Seravus
Leaders.Unlock: Have units in 3 systems that contain alpha or beta wormholes.
Leaders.Ability: After your ships move: For each ship that has a capacity value and moved through 1 or more wormholes, you may place 1 fighter from your reinforcements with that ship if you have unused capacity in the active system.

Leaders.Name: Riftwalker Meian
Leaders.Ability:
SINGULARITY REACTOR
ACTION: Swap the positions of any 2 systems that contain wormholes or your units, other than the Creuss system and the Wormhole Nexus. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Assimilate
FactionAbilities.Ability: When you gain control of a planet, replace each PDS and space dock that is on that planet with a matching unit from your reinforcements.

FactionAbilities.Name: Harrow
FactionAbilities.Ability: At the end of each round of ground combat, your ships in the active system may use their Bombardment abilities against your opponent's ground forces on the planet.

FactionTechnology.Name: Inheritance Systems
FactionTechnology.Description: You may exhaust this card and spend 2 resources when you research a technology; ignore all of that technology's prerequisites.

FactionUnits.Name: Super-Dreadnought II
Abilities: This unit cannot be destroyed by "Direct Hit" action cards.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Cybernetic Enhancements
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: At the start of your turn: Remove 1 token from the L1Z1X player's strategy pool and return it to his reinforcements. Then, place 1 command token from your reinforcements in your strategy pool. Then, return this card to the L1Z1X player.

Abilities: During a space combat, hits produced by this ship and by your dreadnoughts in this system must be assigned to non-fighter ships if able.

Mech.Name: Annihilator
Mech.Description: While not participating in ground combat, this unit can use its BOMBARDMENT ability on planets in its system as if it were a ship.

Leaders.Name: I48S
Leaders.Ability: After a player activates a system: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to replace 1 of their infantry in the active system with 1 mech from their reinforcements.

Leaders.Name: 2RAM
Leaders.Unlock: Have 4 dreadnoughts on the game board
Leaders.Ability: Units that have PLANETARY SHIELD do not prevent you from using Bombardment.

Leaders.Name: The Helmsman
Leaders.Ability:
DARK SPACE NAVIGATION
ACTION: Choose 1 system that does not contain other players' ships; you may move your flagship and any number of your dreadnoughts from other systems into the chosen system. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Edict
FactionAbilities.Ability: When you win a combat, place 1 command token from your opponent's reinforcements in your fleet pool if it does not already contain 1 of that player's tokens; other player's tokens in your fleet pool increase your fleet limit but cannot be redistributed.

FactionAbilities.Name: Imperia
FactionAbilities.Ability: While another player's command token is in your fleet pool, you can use the ability of that player's commander, if it is unlocked.

FactionAbilities.Name: Hubris
FactionAbilities.Ability: During setup, purge your "Alliance" promissory note. Other players cannot give you their "Alliance" promissory note.

FactionTechnology.Name: Genetic Recombination
FactionTechnology.Description: You may exhaust this card before a player casts votes; that player must cast at least 1 vote for an outcome of your choice or remove 1 token from their fleet pool and return it to their reinforcements.

FactionUnits.Name: Crimson Legionnaire I
Abilities: After this unit is destroyed, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good

FactionUnits.Name: Crimson Legionnaire II
Abilities: After this unit is destroyed, gain 1 commodity or convert 1 of your commodities to a trade good. Then, place the unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Scepter of Dominion
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: At the start of the strategy phase: Choose 1 non-home system that contains your units; each other player who has a token on the Mahact player's command sheet places a token from their reinforcements in that system. Then, return this card to the Mahact player.

Flagship.Name: Arvicon Rex
Abilities: During combat against an opponent whose command token is not in your fleet pool, apply +2 to the results of this unit's combat rolls.

Mech.Name: Starlancer
Mech.Description: After a player whose command token is in your fleet pool activates this system, you may spend their token from your fleet pool to end their turn; they gain that token.

Leaders.Name: Jae Mir Kan
Leaders.Ability: When you would spend a command token during the secondary ability of a strategic action: You may exhaust this card to remove 1 of the active player's command tokens from the board and use it instead.

Leaders.Name: Il Na Viroset
Leaders.Unlock: Have 2 other factions' command tokens in your fleet pool.
Leaders.Ability: During your tactical actions, you can activate systems that contain your command tokens. If you do, return both command tokens to your reinforcements and end your turn.

Leaders.Name: Airo Shir Aur
Leaders.Ability:
BENEDICTION
ACTION: Move all units in the space area of any system to an adjacent system that contains a different player's ships. Space Combat is resolved in that system; neither player can retreat or resolve abilities that would move their ships. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Ambush
FactionAbilities.Ability: At the start of a space combat, you may roll 1 die for each of up to 2 of your cruisers or destroyers in the system.  For each result equal to or greater than that ship's combat value, produce 1 hit; your opponent must assign it to 1 of their ships.

FactionAbilities.Name: Pillage
FactionAbilities.Ability: After 1 of your neighbors gains trade goods or resolves a transaction, if they have 3 or more trade goods, you may take 1 of their trade goods or commodities.

FactionTechnology.Name: Salvage Operations
FactionTechnology.Description: After you win or lose a space combat, gain 1 trade good; if you won the combat, you may also produce 1 ship in that system of any ship type that was destroyed during the combat

FactionTechnology.Name: Mirror Computing
FactionTechnology.Description: When you spend trade goods, each trade good is worth 2 resources or influence instead of 1

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Promise of Protection
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: ACTION: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Mentak player cannot use their Pillage faction ability against you. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Mentak player's units, return this card to the Mentak player.

Flagship.Name: Fourth Moon
Abilities: Other players' ships in this system cannot use Sustain Damage.

Mech.Name: Moll Terminus
Mech.Description: Other players' ground forces on this planet cannot use SUSTAIN DAMAGE.

Leaders.Name: Suffi An
Leaders.Ability: After the PILLAGE faction ability is used against another player: You may exhaust this card; if you do, you and that player each draw 1 action card.

Leaders.Name: S'Ula Mentarion
Leaders.Unlock: Have 4 cruisers on the game board
Leaders.Ability: After you win a space combat: You may force your opponent to give you 1 promissory note from their hand.

Leaders.Name: Ipswitch, Loose Cannon
Leaders.Ability:
SLEEPER CELL
At the start of space combat that you are participating in: You may purge this card; if you do, for each other player's ship that is destroyed during this combat, place 1 ship of that type from your reinforcements in the active system.

FactionAbilities.Name: Telepathic
FactionAbilities.Ability: At the end of the strategy phase, place the Naalu "0" token on your strategy card; you are first in initiative order.

FactionAbilities.Name: Foresight
FactionAbilities.Ability: After another player moves ships into a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may place 1 token from your strategy pool in an adjacent system that does not contain another player's ships;  move your ships from the active system into that system.

FactionTechnology.Name: Neuroglaive
FactionTechnology.Description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, that player removes 1 token from his fleet pool and returns it to his reinforcements.

FactionUnits.Name: Hybrid Crystal Fighter II
Abilities: This unit may move without being transported.  Each fighter in excess of your ships' capacity counts as 1/2 of a ship against your fleet pool.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Gift of Prescience
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: At the end of the strategy phase: Place this card face-up in your play area and place the Naalu "0" token on your strategy card; you are first in the initiative order. The Naalu player cannot use their TELEPATHIC faction ability during this game round. Return this card to the Naalu player at the end of the status phase.

Flagship.Name: Matriarch
Abilities: During an invasion in this system, you may commit fighters to planets as if they were ground forces. When combat ends, return those units to the space area.

Mech.Name: Iconoclast
Mech.Description: During combat against an opponent who has at least 1 relic fragment, apply +2 to the results of this unit's combat rolls.

Leaders.Name: Z'eu
Leaders.Ability: After an agenda is revealed: You may exhaust this card to look at the top card of the agenda deck. Then, you may show that card to 1 other player.

Leaders.Name: M'aban
Leaders.Unlock: Have 12 fighters on the game board
Leaders.Ability: You may produce 1 additional fighter for their cost; these additional units do not count against your production limit.

Leaders.Name: The Oracle
Leaders.Ability:
C-RADIUM GEOMETRY
At the end of the status phase: You may force each other player to give you 1 promissory note from their hand. If you do, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Distant Suns
FactionAbilities.Ability: When you explore a planet that contains 1 of your mechs, you may draw 1 additional card; choose 1 to resolve and discard the rest.

FactionAbilities.Name: Fabrication
FactionAbilities.Ability: ACTION: Either purge 2 of your relic fragments of the same type to gain 1 relic; or purge 1 of your relic fragments to gain 1 command token.

FactionTechnology.Name: Supercharge
FactionTechnology.Description: At the start of a combat round, you may exhaust this card to apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat round

FactionTechnology.Name: Pre-Fab Arcologies
FactionTechnology.Description: After you explore a planet, ready that planet

FactionUnits.Name: Z-Grav Eidolon
Abilities: If this unit is in the space area of the active system, it is also a ship. At the end of a space battle in the active system, flip this card.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Black Market Forgery
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: ACTION: Purge 2 of your relic fragments of the same type to gain 1 relic. Then return this card to the Naaz-Rokha player.

Flagship.Name: Visz el Vir
Abilities: Your mechs in this system roll 1 additional die during combat.

Mech.Name: Eidolon
Mech.Description: If this unit is in the space area of the active system at the start of a space combat, flip this card.

Leaders.Name: Garv and Gunn
Leaders.Ability: At the end of a player's turn: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to explore 1 of their planets.

Leaders.Name: Dart and Tai
Leaders.Ability: After you gain control of a planet that was controlled by another player: You may explore that planet.

Leaders.Name: Hesh and Prit
Leaders.Ability:
PERFECT SYNTHESIS
ACTION: Gain 1 relic and perform the secondary ability of up to 2 readied or unchosen strategy cards; during this action, spend command tokens from your reinforcements instead of your strategy pool. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Galactic Threat
FactionAbilities.Ability: You cannot vote on agendas.  Once per agenda phase, after an agenda is revealed, you may predict aloud the outcome of that agenda.  If your prediction is correct, gain 1 technology that is owned by a player who voted how you predicted.

FactionAbilities.Name: Technological Singularity
FactionAbilities.Ability: Once per combat, after 1 of your opponent's units is destroyed, you may gain 1 technology that is owned by that player.

FactionAbilities.Name: Propagation
FactionAbilities.Ability: You cannot research technology.  When you would research a technology, gain 3 command tokens instead.

FactionTechnology.Name: Valefar Assimilator X
FactionTechnology.Description: When you would gain another player's technology using 1 of your faction abilities, you may place the "X" assimilator token on a faction technology owned by that player instead.  While that token is on a technology, this card gains that technology's text.  You cannot place an assimilator token on technology that already has an assimilator token.

FactionTechnology.Name: Valefar Assimilator Y
FactionTechnology.Description: When you would gain another player's technology using 1 of your faction abilities, you may place the "Y" assimilator token on a faction technology owned by that player instead.  While that token is on a technology, this card gains that technology's text.  You cannot place an assimilator token on technology that already has an assimilator token.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Antivirus
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: At the start of a combat: Place this card face-up in your play area. While this card is in your play area, the Nekro player cannot use their TECHNOLOGICAL SINGULARITY faction ability against you. If you activate a system that contains 1 or more of the Nekro player's units, return this card to the Nekro player.

Flagship.Name: The Alastor
Abilities: At the start of a space combat, choose any number of your ground forces in this system to participate in that combat as if they were ships.

Mech.Name: Mordred
Mech.Description: During combat against an opponent who has an "X" or "Y" token on 1 or more of their technologies, apply +2 to the result of each of this unit's combat rolls.

Leaders.Name: Nekro Malleon
Leaders.Ability: During the action phase: You may exhaust this card to choose a player; that player may discard 1 action card or spend 1 command token from their command sheet to gain 2 trade goods.

Leaders.Name: Nekro Acidos
Leaders.Unlock: Own 3 technologies. A "Valefar Assimilator" technology counts only if its X or Y token is on a technology
Leaders.Ability: After you gain a technology: You may draw 1 action card.

Leaders.Name: UNIT.DSGN.FLAYESH
Leaders.Ability:
POLYMORPHIC ALGORITHM
ACTION: Choose a planet that has a technology specialty in a system that contains your units. Destroy any other player's units on that planet. Gain trade goods equal to that planet's combined resource and influence values and gain 1 technology that matches the specialty of that planet. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: The Company
FactionAbilities.Ability: During setup, take the 2 additional Nomad faction agents and place them next to your faction sheet; you have 3 agents.

FactionAbilities.Name: Future Sight
FactionAbilities.Ability: During the Agenda phase, after an outcome that you voted for or predicted is resolved, gain 1 trade good.

FactionTechnology.Name: Temporal Command Suite
FactionTechnology.Description: After any player's agent becomes exhausted, you may exhaust this card to ready that agent; if you ready another player's agent, you may perform a transaction with that player.

FactionUnits.Name: Memoria II
Abilities: If this unit is in the space area of the active system, it is also a ship. At the end of a space battle in the active system, flip this card.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: The Cavalry
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: At the start of a space combat against a player other than the Nomad: During this combat, treat 1 of your non-fighter ships as if it has the SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability, combat value, and ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE value of the Nomad's flagship Return this card to the Nomad player at the end of this combat.

Flagship.Name: Memoria
Abilities: You may treat this unit as if it were adjacent to systems that contain one or more of your mechs.

Mech.Name: Quantum Manipulator
Mech.Description: While this unit is in a space area during combat, you may use its SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability to cancel a hit that is produced against your ships in this system.

Leaders.Name: Artuno the Betrayer
Leaders.Ability: When you gain trade goods from the supply: You may exhaust this card to place an equal number of trade goods on this card. When this card readies, gain the trade goods on this card.

Leaders.Name: Field Marshall Mercer
Leaders.Ability: At the end of a player's turn: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to remove up to 2 of their ground forces from the game board and place them on planets they control in the active system.

Leaders.Name: The Thundarian
Leaders.Ability: After the "Roll Dice" step of combat: You may exhaust this card. If you do, hits are not assigned to either players' units. Return to the start of this combat round's "Roll Dice" step.

Leaders.Name: Navarch Feng
Leaders.Ability: You can produce your flagship without spending resources.

Leaders.Name: Mirik Aun Sissiri
Leaders.Ability:
PROBABILITY MATRIX
ACTION: Place this card near the game board; your flagship and units it transports can move out of systems that contain your command tokens during this game round. At the end of that game round, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Unrelenting
FactionAbilities.Ability: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls.

FactionTechnology.Name: Valkyrie Particle Weave
FactionTechnology.Description: After making combat rolls during a round of ground combat, if your opponent produced 1 or more hits, you produce 1 additional hit.

FactionUnits.Name: Exotrireme II
Abilities: This unit cannot be destroyed by "Direct Hit" action cards.
After a round of space combat, you may destroy this unit to destroy up to 2 ships in this system.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Tekklar Legion
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: At the start of an invasion combat: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat.  If your opponent is the N'orr player, apply -1 to the result of each of his unit's combat rolls during this combat. Then, return this card to the N'orr player.

Flagship.Name: C'Morran N'orr
Abilities: Apply +1 to the result of each of your other ship's combat rolls in this system.

Mech.Name: Valkyrie Exoskeleton
Mech.Description: After this unit uses its SUSTAIN DAMAGE ability during Ground Combat, it produces 1 hit against your opponent's ground forces on this planet.

Leaders.Name: T'ro
Leaders.Ability: At the end of a player's tactical action: You may exhaust this card; if you do, that player may place 2 infantry from their reinforcements on a planet they control in the active system.

Leaders.Name: G'hom Sek'kus
Leaders.Ability: During the "Commit Ground Forces" step: You can commit up to 1 ground force from each planet in the active system and each planet in adjacent systems that do not contain 1 of your command tokens.

Leaders.Name: Sh'val Harbinger
Leaders.Ability:
TEKKLAR CONDITIONING
After you move ships into the active system: You may skip directly to the "Commit Ground Forces" step. If you do, after you commit ground forces to land on planets, purge this card and return each of your ships in the active system to your reinforcements.

FactionAbilities.Name: Terragenesis
FactionAbilities.Ability: After you explore a planet that does not have a sleeper token, you may place or move 1 sleeper token onto that planet.

FactionAbilities.Name: Awaken
FactionAbilities.Ability: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your sleeper tokens, you may replace each of those tokens with 1 PDS from your reinforcements.

FactionAbilities.Name: Coalescence
FactionAbilities.Ability: If your flagship or your AWAKEN faction ability places your units into the same space area or onto the same planet as another player's units, your units must participate in combat during "Space Combat" or "Ground Combat" steps.

FactionUnits.Name: Hel Titan I
Abilities: This unit is treated as both a structure and a ground force. It cannot be transported.

FactionUnits.Name: Hel Titan II
Abilities: This unit is treated as both a structure and a ground force. It cannot be transported.
You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are adjacent to this unit's system.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Terraform
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: ACTION: Attach this card to a non-home planet you control other than Mecatol Rex. Its resource and influence values are each increased by 1 and it is treated as having all 3 planet traits (Cultural, Hazardous, and Industrial).

Flagship.Name: Ouranos
Abilities: DEPLOY: After you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your PDS, you may replace 1 of those PDS with this unit.

Mech.Name: Hecatoncheires
Mech.Description: DEPLOY: When you would place a PDS on a planet, you may place 1 mech and 1 infantry on that planet instead.

Leaders.Name: Tellurian
Leaders.Ability: When a hit is produced against a unit: You may exhaust this card to cancel that hit.

Leaders.Name: Tungstantus
Leaders.Unlock: Have 5 structures on the game board
Leaders.Ability: When 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION: You may gain 1 trade good.

Leaders.Name: Ul The Progenitor
Leaders.Ability:
GEOFORM
ACTION: Ready Elysium and attach this card to it. Its resource and influence values are each increased by 3, and it gains the SPACE CANNON 5 (x3) ability as if it were a unit.

FactionAbilities.Name: Fragile
FactionAbilities.Ability: Apply -1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls.

FactionAbilities.Name: Brilliant
FactionAbilities.Ability: When you spend a command token to resolve the secondary ability of the "Technology" strategy card, you may resolve the primary ability instead.

FactionAbilities.Name: Analytical
FactionAbilities.Ability: When you research a technology that is not a unit upgrade technology, you may ignore 1 prerequisite.

FactionTechnology.Name: E-Res Siphons
FactionTechnology.Description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, gain 4 trade goods.

FactionTechnology.Name: Spacial Conduit Cylinder
FactionTechnology.Description: You may exhaust this card after you activate a system that contains 1 or more of your units; that system is adjacent to all other systems that contain 1 or more of your units during this activation.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Research Agreement
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: After the Jol-Nar player researches a technology that is not a faction technology: Gain that technology. Then, return this card to the Jol-Nar player.

Flagship.Name: J.N.S Hylarim
Abilities: When making a combat roll for this ship, each result of 9 or 10, before applying modifiers, produces 2 additional hits.

Mech.Name: Shield Paling
Mech.Description: Your infantry on this planet are not affected by your FRAGILE faction ability.

Leaders.Name: Doctor Sucaban
Leaders.Ability: When a player spends resources to research: You may exhaust this card to allow that player to remove any number of their infantry from the game board. For each unit removed, reduce the resources spent by 1.

Leaders.Name: Ta Zern
Leaders.Ability: After you roll dice for a unit ability: You may reroll any of those dice.

Leaders.Name: Rin, The Master's Legacy
Leaders.Ability:
GENETIC MEMORY
ACTION: For each non-unit upgrade technology you own, you may replace that technology with any technology of the same color from the deck. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Devour
FactionAbilities.Ability: Capture your opponent's non-structure units that are destroyed during combat.

FactionAbilities.Name: Amalgamation
FactionAbilities.Ability: When you produce a unit, you may return 1 captured unit of that type to produce that unit without spending resources.

FactionAbilities.Name: Riftmeld
FactionAbilities.Ability: When you research a unit upgrade technology, you may return 1 captured unit of that type to ignore all of the technology's prerequisites.

FactionTechnology.Name: Vortex
FactionTechnology.Description: ACTION: Exhaust this card to choose another player's non-structure unit in a system that is adjacent to 1 or more of your space docks. Capture 1 unit of that type from that player's reinforcements

FactionUnits.Name: Dimensional Tear I
Abilities: This system is a gravity rift; your ships do not roll for this gravity rift.
Place a dimensional tear token beneath this unit as a reminder.
Up to 6 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.

FactionUnits.Name: Dimensional Tear II
Abilities: This system is a gravity rift; your ships do not roll for this gravity rift.
Place a dimensional tear token beneath this unit as a reminder.
Up to 12 fighters in this system do not count against your ships' capacity.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Crucible
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: After you activate a system: Your ships do not roll for gravity rifts during this movement; apply an additional +1 to the move values of your ships that would move out of or through a gravity rift instead. Then, return this card to the Vuil'raith player.

Flagship.Name: The Terror Between
Abilities: Capture all other non-structure units that are destroyed in this system, including your own.

Mech.Name: Reanimator
Mech.Description: When your infantry on this planet are destroyed, place them on your faction sheet; those units are captured.

Leaders.Name: The Stillness of Stars
Leaders.Ability: After another player replenishes commodities: You may exhaust this card to convert their commodities to trade goods and capture 1 unit from their reinforcements that has a cost equal to or lower than their commodity value.

Leaders.Name: That Which Molds Flesh
Leaders.Ability: When you produce fighter or infantry units: Up to 2 of those units do not count against your PRODUCTION limit.

Leaders.Name: It Feeds on Carrion
Leaders.Ability:
DIMENSIONAL ANCHOR
ACTION: Each other player rolls a die for each of their non-fighter ships that are in or adjacent to a system that contains a dimensional tear; on a 1-3, capture that unit. If this causes a player's ground forces or fighters to be removed, also capture those units. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Blood Ties
FactionAbilities.Ability: You do not have to spend influence to remove the custodians token from Mecatol Rex.

FactionAbilities.Name: Reclamation
FactionAbilities.Ability: After you resolve a tactical action during which you gained control of Mecatol Rex, you may place 1 PDS and 1 space dock from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

FactionTechnology.Name: Lazax Gate Folding
FactionTechnology.Description: During your tactical actions, if you do not control Mecatol Rex, treat its system as if it contains both an alpha and beta wormhole. ACTION: If you control Mecatol Rex, exhaust this card to place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.

FactionTechnology.Name: Hegemonic Trade Policy
FactionTechnology.Description: Exhaust this card when 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION; swap the resource and influence values of 1 planet you control during that use of Production.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Acquiescence
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: At the end of the strategy phase: Exchange 1 of your strategy cards with a strategy card that was chosen by the Winnu player. Then, return this card to the Winnu player.

Flagship.Name: Salai Sai Corian
Abilities: When this unit makes a combat roll, it rolls a number of dice equal to the number of your opponent's non-fighter ships in this system.

Mech.Name: Reclaimer
Mech.Description: After you resolve a tactical action where you gained control of this planet, you may place 1 PDS or 1 Space Dock from your reinforcements on this planet.

Leaders.Name: Breekar Berekon
Leaders.Ability: When 1 or more of a player's units use PRODUCTION: You may exhaust this card to reduce the combined cost of the produced units by 2.

Leaders.Name: Rickar Rickani
Leaders.Unlock: Control Mecatol Rex or enter into a combat in the Mecatol Rex system.
Leaders.Ability: During combat: Apply +2 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls in the Mecatol Rex system, your home system, and each system that contains a legendary planet

Leaders.Name: Mathis Mathinus
Leaders.Ability:
IMPERIAL SEAL
ACTION: Perform the primary ability of any strategy card. Then, choose any number of other players. Those players may perform the secondary ability of that strategy card. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Peace Accords
FactionAbilities.Ability: After you resolve the primary or secondary ability of the "Diplomacy" strategy card, you may gain control of 1 planet other than Mecatol Rex that does not contain any units and is in a system that is adjacent to a planet you control.

FactionAbilities.Name: Quash
FactionAbilities.Ability: When an agenda is revealed, you may spend 1 token from your strategy pool to discard that agenda and reveal 1 agenda from the top of the deck. Players vote on this agenda instead.

FactionTechnology.Name: Nullification Field
FactionTechnology.Description: After another player activates a system that contains 1 or more of your ships, you may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool; immediately end that player's turn.

FactionTechnology.Name: Instinct Training
FactionTechnology.Description: You may exhaust this card and spend 1 token from your strategy pool when another player plays an action card; cancel that action card.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Political Favor
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: When an agenda is revealed: Remove 1 token from the Xxcha player's strategy pool and return it to their reinforcements.  Then, discard the revealed agenda and reveal 1 agenda from the top of the deck. Players vote on this agenda instead. Then, return this card to the Xxcha player.

Flagship.Name: Loncarra Ssodu
Abilities: You may use this unit's SPACE CANNON against ships that are in adjacent systems.

Mech.Name: Indomitus
Mech.Description: You may use this unit's Space Cannon ability against ships that are in adjacent systems.

Leaders.Name: Ggrocuto Rinn
Leaders.Ability: ACTION: Exhaust this card to ready any planet; if that planet is in a system that is adjacent to a planet you control, you may remove 1 infantry from that planet and return it to its reinforcements.

Leaders.Name: Elder Qanoj
Leaders.Unlock: Control planets that have a combined value of at least 12 influence
Leaders.Ability: Each planet you exhaust to cast votes provides 1 additional vote. Game effects cannot prevent you from voting on an agenda.

Leaders.Name: Xxekir Grom
Leaders.Ability:
POLITICAL DATA NEXUS
ACTION: You may discard 1 law from play. Look at the top 5 cards of the agenda deck. Choose 2 to reveal, and resolve each as if you had cast 1 vote for an outcome of your choice; discard the rest. Other players cannot resolve abilities during this action. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Indoctrination
FactionAbilities.Ability: At the start of a ground combat, you may spend 2 influence to replace 1 of your opponent's participating infantry with 1 infantry from your reinforcements.

FactionAbilities.Name: Devotion
FactionAbilities.Ability: After each space battle round, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit and assign it to 1 of your opponent's ships in that system.

FactionTechnology.Name: Impulse Core
FactionTechnology.Description: At the start of a space combat, you may destroy 1 of your cruisers or destroyers in the active system to produce 1 hit against your opponent's ships; that hit must be assigned by your opponent to 1 of their non-fighter ships, if able.

FactionTechnology.Name: Yin Spinner
FactionTechnology.Description: After 1 or more of your units use PRODUCTION, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements on a planet you control in that system.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Greyfire Mutagen
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: After a system is activated: The Yin player cannot use faction abilities or faction technology during this tactical action. Then, return this card to the Yin player.

Flagship.Name: Van Hauge
Abilities: When this ship is destroyed, destroy all ships in this system.

Mech.Name: Moyin's Ashes
Mech.Description: DEPLOY: When you use your INDOCTRINATION faction ability, you may spend 1 additional influence to replace your opponent's unit with 1 mech instead of 1 infantry.

Leaders.Name: Brother Milor
Leaders.Ability: After a player's destroyer or cruiser is destroyed: You may exhaust this card; if you do, that player may place up to 2 fighters from their reinforcements in that unit's system.

Leaders.Name: Brother Omar
Leaders.Ability: This card satisfies a green technology prerequisite. You may produce 1 additional infantry for their cost. These infantry do not count against your production limit.

Leaders.Name: Dannel of the Tenth
Leaders.Ability:
SPINNER OVERDRIVE
ACTION: For each planet that contains any number of your infantry, either ready that planet or place an equal number of infantry from your reinforcements on that planet. Then, purge this card.

FactionAbilities.Name: Stall Tactics
FactionAbilities.Ability: ACTION: Discard 1 action card from your hand.

FactionAbilities.Name: Scheming
FactionAbilities.Ability: When you draw 1 or more action cards, draw 1 additional action card. Then, choose and discard 1 action card from your hand.

FactionAbilities.Name: Crafty
FactionAbilities.Ability: You can have any number of action cards in your hand.  Game effects cannot prevent you from using this ability.

FactionTechnology.Name: Transparasteel Plating
FactionTechnology.Description: During your turn of the action phase, players that have passed cannot play action cards.

FactionTechnology.Name: Mageon Implants
FactionTechnology.Description: ACTION: Exhaust this card to look at another player's hand of action cards. Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand.

FactionPromissoryNote.Name: Spy Net
FactionPromissoryNote.Description: At the start of your turn: Look at the Yssaril player's hand of action cards. Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand. Then, return this card to the Yssaril player.

Flagship.Name: Y'sia Y'ssrila
Abilities: This ship can move through systems that contain other player's ships.

Mech.Name: Blackshade Infiltrator
Mech.Description: DEPLOY: After you use your STALL TACTICS faction ability, you may place 1 mech on a planet you control

Leaders.Name: Ssruu
Leaders.Ability: This card has the text ability of each other player's agent, even if that agent is exhausted.

Leaders.Name: So Ata
Leaders.Ability: After another player activates a system that contains your units: You may look at that player's action cards, promissory notes, or secret objectives.

Leaders.Name: Kyver, Blade and Key
Leaders.Ability:
GUILD OF SPIES
ACTION: Each other player shows you 1 action card from their hand. For each player, you may either take that card or force that player to discard 3 random action cards from their hand. Then, purge this card.
